The NTR in this series is revenge NTR where the bullied guy from high school becomes a successful business man and his secretary is a girl who he liked from back then who liked and had sex with his bully. His homeroom teacher was also a bitch who looked down on him and was also in a relationship with his bully. The teacher is still dating his bully but isn't satisfied with him anymore after the MC fucked her. There's one other teacher who isn't as bad and she's friends with the bitch teacher and the MC goes out with her first after "taming" her. This series is pretty good with girls with nice asses and nice tits and submissive personalities.
